title: Formative Assessment and Interaction Design Project for Massive Open Online Courses (MOOCs)

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of Basic Scientific Concepts and Proficiency in Basic Smartphone Usage
context.additional_context: A foundational science education program at vocational training institutions, implementing project-based learning in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, emphasizing formative assessment and interactive design.

learning_goals: Learners can design and apply formative assessments using quizzes, peer evaluations, and simulations in a MOOC environment.
Learners can develop and implement interaction strategies through project-based activities in small groups.
Learners can plan smartphone-based educational content and build feedback systems under technological constraints.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
